item.title: Loop unlooping in Javascript
item.description: Few days ago I’ve read a book ‘Even Faster Web Sites‘ about websites optimisation and I found one thing usefuluseful, not only on websites. There was a small tip about looploop unlooping. I want to quote them for later use.
